name: 1GAW - Week 13
description:
Note: This is a very small prototype used to test out a game mechanic and was made in a few days. Since it's a prototype expect a lot of bugs.
Use the right mouse button to walk around the level. Your workers will follow you.

You can then left click blocks to assign a dig job to a worker, and they will try to dig their way into the block you assigned.

You can queue multiple dig jobs on the same block, which can let you dig certain blocks a lot faster.
